title: London Prime Property Market Recovers 35% in 2025 – Foreign Investors Return
shortdescription: Mayfair and Kensington prices surge as Middle Eastern and Asian buyers flood back into the UK capital.
description: London's prime property market has staged a remarkable recovery in 2025, with prices in Mayfair, Kensington, and Chelsea surging 35% year-over-year after years of Brexit-related stagnation.
author: jonathan Gill

title: Canada Real Estate Market Correction Deepens – Toronto and Vancouver Prices Down 25%
shortdescription: Rising mortgage rates and foreign buyer ban trigger worst housing correction since the 1990s.
description: Canada's real estate market is experiencing its most severe correction in three decades, with average home prices in Toronto and Vancouver declining 25% from their 2023 peaks.
author: jonathan Gill

title: Office Real Estate Crisis Deepens in 2025 – $2 Trillion in Value Destroyed by Remote Work
shortdescription: Commercial office vacancy rates hit 25% nationwide as companies abandon traditional headquarters.
description: The U.S. office real estate market faces an existential crisis as commercial vacancy rates have soared to 25% nationally, with some major cities experiencing rates exceeding 30%.
author: jonathan Gill

title: Affordable Housing Crisis Worsens in 2025 – Average Rent Reaches $2,500 Nationwide
shortdescription: Rent burden affects 60% of Americans as housing costs outpace wage growth by 3x.
description: The affordable housing crisis in the United States has reached unprecedented levels in 2025, with average monthly rent reaching $2,500 nationwide and exceeding $4,000 in major metropolitan areas.
author: jonathan Gill
